name: Sheep's Clothing (javo397)
description:
Wolves have disguised themselves as sheep, and are hiding among your flock. Find and kill them before it's too late. As you approach, sheep will move away from you (unless blocked by another sheep), while wolves will stand their ground, ready to attack if you stay near them too long or get too close. Kill all of the wolves before running out of bullets or losing too many sheep. Survive 4 rounds to win.

Controls

  • Move: WASD
  • Aim gun: Mouse
  • Fire gun: Mouse left click
